segments.text: Good Morning . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good Morning , I have a bad cough , and I want to see an internist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a registration card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t . I ' m a tourist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you need to register as a new patient . Can I have a look at you ID card ? I need your name , age , occupation , address and contacting number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Which kind of medicine do you prefer , western medicine or traditional Chinese medicine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to try traditional Chinese medicine . I heard it really works quite well if you know what you're doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Yes , he does . The registration fee is 7 yuan , please .
segments.speaker: S1
